statements: SELECT * FROM laboratory_inventory;
SELECT name, quantity FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, location FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY location, name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, quantity FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, location FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, name, location FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM laboratory_inventory WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM reagents;
SELECT id, name FROM reagents WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM reagents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location IS NULL;
SELECT id, type, location FROM equipment ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reagents WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT name, quantity FROM reagents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE type = 'Microscope' AND location IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, name, location FROM equipment ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment WHERE location LIKE '%lab%'
SELECT * FROM reagents ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM reagents WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM reagents WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE type = 'Microscope' AND status = 'Available';
SELECT id, action_type, action_date, action_by FROM inventory_log ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reagents WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, quantity FROM reagents WHERE expiration_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, type FROM equipment WHERE status = 'available' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_log WHERE action_type = 'received' AND action_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, quantity, expiration_date FROM reagents WHERE quantity < 10 AND expiration_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Reagents;
SELECT reagent_name, supplier FROM Reagents WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'incoming' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_type, log_date FROM InventoryLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Reagents WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY reagent_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reagent_name, supplier, expiration_date FROM Reagents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, warranty_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY manufacturer DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT reagent_name, supplier, quantity, expiration_date FROM Reagents JOIN InventoryTransactions ON Reagents.reagent_id = InventoryTransactions.reagent_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Incoming' AND quantity > 0;
SELECT Equipment.*, InventoryLogs.log_type FROM Equipment JOIN InventoryLogs ON Equipment.equipment_id = InventoryLogs.equipment_id WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM reagents;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM reagents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier, name FROM reagents WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE type = 'Lab' AND availability = TRUE ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, capacity - available_space AS used_space FROM storage_location WHERE available_space IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM reagents WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM reagents WHERE supplier = 'ABC Suppliers' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.name, r.quantity, l.action, l.timestamp FROM reagents r JOIN inventory_log l ON r.id = l.item_id WHERE l.action = 'RESTOCK' ORDER BY l.timestamp DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.type, e.availability, l.timestamp FROM equipment e JOIN inventory_log l ON e.id = l.item_id WHERE e.availability = true ORDER BY l.timestamp DESC;
SELECT d.name, d.supervisor, s.location_name, s.capacity FROM department d LEFT JOIN storage_location s ON d.location_id = s.id WHERE s.available_space > 0 ORDER BY d.name DESC;
